title: Joint Event Starts!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Alright! This should be a good rundown for our joint school idol event!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah. I’d say we did a pretty good job making it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>You two are really amazing for coming up with so many different ideas, Chika-san, Honoka-san. I’m sure this will be a great event.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe~, thanks for the compliment~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>But we wouldn’t have been able to compile it like this with just me and Honoka-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ahaha.... We just kept adding all kinds of things into it, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You were the one who coordinated everything, Ayumu-chan! It’s all thanks to you! I guess that makes you the captain of this event, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eeeh!? You’re exaggerating! I only helped the two of you put your ideas together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That’s what makes you amazing~. Hey you two, let’s make this joint event a success for sure!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
